title: Bug 114470 - Error message thrown when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter
description: Upon using the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter in a table, an error message is thrown.
OB: When attempting to use the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter in a table, an error message is displayed.
EB: The filter should successfully use the value new Date("3/2/2005") without throwing any error message.
SR: 1. Create a new datasource and dataset that contains a datetime column. 2. Insert a table. 3. Create a filter based on the datetime column. 4. In the value input field, enter new Date("3/2/2005").
